reviews.review: Even though the Co-op was short, it was still an enjoyable time playing with a friend

Very fun game to play co-op and solo, has a lot of puzzles (i mean the whole game is a puzzle), some are easy to solve while other are hard. Also it gives you a very good feedback when you complete a level and you are about to go to the next one.
Jorrit vond dit spel wel leuk
Valve, for the love of God, make Portal 3...
The game is very good and the levels are pretty challenging.
Muy buen jugo para jugar solo o con compañero, rompecabezas faciles y dificiles.
very good for playing with a friend uwu
This is a good game, plain and simple. You can normally catch it on sale for very low prices, and I can't think of any reason why you wouldn't want to buy this.
不论是朋友之间欢乐互坑还是合力通关都是一个不错的选择
好玩，停不下来。合作模式真的是欢乐多。
What can I say? Really good game.
I stopped playing this game because it was like *PENETRATION NOICES*

Très bon jeu de réflexion, certains niveaux demandent de la dextérité, d'autres de la réflexion. C'est un bon mélange qui tient en haleine, et duquel on aimerait ne pas avoir de fin. 

Glados est parfois à PTDR sur certaines de ses expressions qui deviendraient presque culte.
"Glad to kill you!"
"The cake is a lie!"
Le nom en lui-même est un clin d'oeil plein d'humour.

Le final est plaisant.

Игра ну ооооооооочень интересная, но короткая всего на 10 часов геймплея, а если прошли ее то можно поиграть в кооперативный режим с другими игроками(еще можно поиграть в первую часть, она тоже интересная).
гы гы гы, редактирую во время распродажи!
Gra jest bardzo przyjazna polecam wszystkim.
This is a really nice brain trainer game.

Great storyline, great maps, nice gameplay. Though the storyline can be finished quite fast, there are still countless submitted custom maps to play once you're finished. I'd definitely recommend this game for anyone who is doubting whether to get the game or not.
its like portal 1 but like more story driven i guess idk its fun tho
Really enjoyed the experience , puzzles were engaging and fun.
This games has it all. Unique games play mechanics, comedy, riddles, fps, zero violence, co-op, editor and community levels. A must-have for any game classics curator out there.
прикольная игра, прошёл за 2 дня с другом!
Very fun puzzle game and fun story mode
really good game and story line. Love the way it was made.
One of the best games ever made, 10/10 would recommend
If you want this game for free, message me.
Good game for single or co-op
Uno dei migliori giochi di logica e coop di sempre
This game is brilliant, my friend and I spent hours just playing the multiplayer mode
Acayip Güzel Oyun Üstelik Yaz İndiriminde iken alınca daha da güzel şuan 1 80 arkadaşlarınız varsa eğlencesi ayrı güzel oluyor

Единсветная игра где можно уйти из рашки
Someone should teach Valve how to count to 3 PepeLaugh

Que dire de ce jeu. Excellent, tout simplement. Des graphismes époustouflants, un bon scénario et une mécanique de jeu unique en son genre, bref, achetez le (en plus 81 centimes c'est le prix d'une baguette de pain donc ^^)
Bardzo fajna gra do pogrania z kumplem.
